variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

dependencies.name: perl
dependencies.description:
Perl 5 is a highly capable, feature-rich programming language with over
27 years of development.

dependencies.name: perl-email-address-xs
dependencies.description: Parse and format RFC 5322 email addresses and groups

dependencies.name: perl-email-mime-contenttype
dependencies.description: Parse and build a MIME Content-Type or Content-Disposition Header

dependencies.name: perl-email-mime-encodings
dependencies.description: A unified interface to MIME encoding and decoding

dependencies.name: perl-email-simple
dependencies.description: Simple parsing of RFC2822 message format and headers
